subSections.title: Readings
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}} {{wikipedia|Crow}} {{wikipedia|Raven}} [[File:Kolkrabe.jpg|thumb|250px|{{m|ja|烏|tr=karasu}}: a '''[[raven]]''', a '''[[raven]]'''.]]
Compound of {{com|ja|sort=からす|から|tr1=kara|t1=caw|pos1=onomatopoeia, imitative of a crow's [[caw]]|す|tr2=su|t2=bird|pos2=ancient suffix appearing in certain bird names, possibly cognate with {{cog|ko|새||bird}}}}.{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}} Compare the {{m|ja|す|tr=su}} in {{m|ja|鶯|tr=uguisu}}, {{m|ja|杜鵑|tr=hototogisu}}, {{m|ja|モズ|tr=mozu}}.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|からす|カラス}}

# a [[crow]] or a [[raven]]

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text:
This is the most common reading for this character when used in isolation in modern Japanese.

{{U:ja:biology|カラス}}
